basics.name: Cameron Golden
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Whitacre College of Engineering at Texas Tech University. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

work.summary: Directly responsible for leading 70+ team members and ensuring smooth operation of events with 8,000+ attendees and 10 on site sales locations.
Responsible for upkeep, maintenance and installation of hardware and software company wide.
highlights: Consistently working with both wireless and wired networks
Responding to end user support requests
Working with a wide range of systems, from audio visual equipment to poe security systems
Maintain and update website with current information and events

volunteer.summary: Team Captain for my high school SeaPerch team.
highlights: Lead a small team directly responsible for 3D Modeling and manufactuing of parts for our competition ROV.
Coordinating and communicating with other captains to ensure all aspects, from design, to travel between competitions goes smoothly and efficently.

awards.title: Eagle Scout
awards.summary: The highest achievement or rank attainable in the Boy Scouts of America program. I exceeded the requirements by earning 35 merit badges, fulfilling multiple leadership roles, and complete a comprehensive service project in my community.

awards.title: Make a Splash & Wildcard Award
awards.summary: My team won the Make a Splash and wildcard awards, Allowing us to advance to the international competition level.

awards.title: Sportsmanship Award
awards.summary: My team won the Sportmanship Award for 'A commitment to fair play, ethical behavior and integrity, and general goodwill towards others'.
